name: fetch_movies
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool abir82_bollywood_recommendations.
Tool description: This API recommends a list of Bollywood movies from 2000 to 2019 based on the genre and year selected by the user
API description: Fetch a list of movies from 2000 to 2019 based on the selected genre and year using the specified RapidAPI key.

year.description: The year for which to fetch movies. Should be between 2000 and 2019.

genre.description: The genre of the movies to fetch.
